official_title: A bill to name the building to be constructed in Lufkin, Texas, and leased to the United States as the "Colonel Homer Garrison, Jr. Federal Building".

summary.text: Designates a building to be constructed in Lufkin, Texas, and leased to the United States as the Colonel Homer Garrison, Jr., Federal Building.
